title: Life expectancy in Asia in 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Regions for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
In Region East Asia, Females had the highest SOME LABEL 80.0 among the 2 groups and in South Asia, Males had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
In Region East Asia, Females had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Region South Asia out of all 6 Regions.
There is a gap of 9.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Females in Region East Asia and South Asia.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Regions on X-axis for 2 groups Males, and Females. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Region East Asia, Females had the highest SOME LABEL 80.0 among the 2 groups and in South Asia, Males had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Regions for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
In Region East Asia, Females had the highest SOME LABEL 80.0 among the 2 groups and in South Asia, Males had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
In Region East Asia, Females had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Region South Asia out of all 6 Regions.
There is a gap of 9.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Females in Region East Asia and South Asia.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Regions on X-axis for 2 groups Males, and Females. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Region East Asia had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Females. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Region South Asia for Males.
In Region East Asia, Females had the highest SOME LABEL among all 6 Regions and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Region South Asia.
Region East Asia and South Asia had the biggest gap of 9.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Females.
Among the groups, Males had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 1.1 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
Averaging all 2 groups Males, and Females, the Region East Asia is the maximum SOME LABEL and South Asia is the minimum SOME LABEL.
